review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: Cross-model review (Claude reviewing Codex code): ERR-006 2-phase submit verification. injection.js: Enter dispatch → acceptance verification (prompt/output transition) with 1 retry+backoff, defer-while-active-output (2s hard cap, no deadlock). Failure paths: submit_not_accepted emits inject.failed + markPotentiallyStuck. Safety timer extended to 9s for defer+verify+retry window. Constants use internal defaults (consistent with existing pattern). Double-completion guard via completed flag. Minor: retry could double-Enter if first accepted but verification missed signal — mitigated by defer check + CLI ignoring empty submits. 3 new tests (retry-success, retry-exhaustion, event emission). 108 suites / 3287 tests pass.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
